transcript: a true CEO should be operating the business and so most of the time that means that they're casting the vision and they're leading the rest of the leaders in the business through their departments I tend to be Project based so I tend to go really deep on very meaningful projects that will move a big thing forward and I'll do that for as long as it takes L is completely different than me and we are co-founders so that's how we divide things up is I'll go make something really really valuable and I'll think about how we're going to Market it and position it and sell it and then she thinks about everything else that has to happen in the business in order to make sure that happens
